author: PRNW
title: Pocket Games Critical Information - BrokerBank Securities
text:
NEW YORK , Sept. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Pocket Games, Inc. (OTCBB: PKGM) shares closed at $.1699 , off 2.91%. Volume was higher than usual at 221,203 shares. The PKGM share price has been on a steady climb from a low of $.04 at the beginning of the summer.
Our due diligence report will inform investors about PKGM developments. Get our report at the link below with no cost obligation.
http://bit.ly/_PKGM_Due_Diligence
Copy and paste to browser may be required.
About Pocket Games, Inc.
Pocket Games, Inc. is a video games development, testing and publishing Company. It is fully reporting and is listed on the OTC Market under the symbol (OTC PINK: PKGM). Formed in 2013, the Company has developed games for third parties and has acquired video game IP since its inception and goes to market either via third party publishers or via self-publication.
FORWARD-LOOKING DISCLAIMER

COMPLIANCE PROCEDURE

Affiliated parties involved with producing and issuing this release have not been compensated in any form by any source. A full disclaimer can be found by viewing due diligence. We are only human and may make mistakes. If you notice any errors or omissions, please notify us below.
